channel.title: Devolution server question
channel.description:
1.) how do i make a command, so when admins type ::phat it gives them a phat set
2.) How do i give new people some default armour/wep rather than none
3.) is there any way i can enable pk ever where,
4.) how can i make more menus?
5.) whats the premium status for?
6.) where can i get a list of items for this server
7.) how can i make items drop like a drop party?
8.) How can i make a command that makes my guy tough
im using devolution 7 so if anyone can help please. thanks

item.title: Devolution server question
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

I couldnt find it, im using the devolution v7, maybe you can find it for me,

if you do will you please make the default elfit,
Full Gilded
Fire Cape
Yellow boots, gloves
Fury
Whip

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution server question
item.dc:creator: @untelo untelo
item.description:
@untelo wrote:

Dunno about good sources, but it’s easy to make ::god

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“god”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
sendMessage(“God mode on, walk one step to keep active”);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“godoff”) && playerRights >= 0){
sendMessage(“god mode off”);
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution server question
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

do you know any sources/servers that have

alot of codes like, ::God ::adminglow ::bomb ::xtelemeto (playername) ::hit ::master

has skill capes and bandos

also are there any with the new interface instead of the ugly old one?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:

making drop party only for owner and admin

item.title: Devolution server question
item.dc:creator: @untelo untelo
item.description:
@untelo wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("phat") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(1038, 1); addItem(1040, 1); addItem(1042, 1); addItem(1044, 1); addItem(1046, 1); addItem(1048, 1); sendMessage("Party!"); }

Try if u can find something like this in ur player.java

//Giving the player a unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;
Change the -1 to the item id. For example:

playerEquipment[playerShield]=1171; gives the player wooden shield

Search for

public boolean nonWild()

And there should be something like

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >=2750 && absX <=2987 && absY >=2869 && absY <=2940 ) || (absX >=2783 && absX <=2811 && absY >=2770 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=3557 && absX <=3583 && absY >=3392 && absY <=3412 ) || (absX >=2896 && absX <=2926 && absY >=3598 && absY <=3627 ) || (absX >=2527 && absX <=2550 && absY >=4709 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=3227 && absX <=3239 && absY >=9310 && absY <=9323 ) || (absX >=2837 && absX <=2866 && absY >=3659 && absY <=3696 ) || (absX >=2368 && absX <=2431 && absY >=5056 && absY <=5119 ) || (absX >=2822 && absX <=2853 && absY >=3789 && absY <=3806 ) || heightLevel == 1 || (absX >=2822 && absX <=2853 && absY >=3789 && absY <=3806 ) || heightLevel == 2) return true; else return false; }
Make it look like

public boolean nonWild() { return true; else return false; }

Make a command like this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("serverinfo") && playerRights >= 0) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("Server info", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("server info", 8146); sendQuest("Welcome to UnteloScape", 8147); sendQuest("", 8148); sendQuest("Please do NOT ask for Mod or Admin", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("WORKING TELE BLOCK EVEN IF U USE TABS", 8151); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("When you get a lvl 99 stat you get a skill cape.", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuest("When you get 3 lvl 99 stats you can ask any admin", 8155); sendQuest("for a set of green elegants.", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("When you get 5 lvl 99 stats you can ask any admin", 8158); sendQuest("for a set of red elegants.", 8159); sendQuest("", 8160); sendQuest("When you get 8 lvl 99 stats you can ask any admin", 8161); sendQuest("for a set of black elegants.", 8162); sendQuest("", 8163); sendQuest("Use ::commands for commands.", 8164); sendQuest("", 8165); sendQuest("Staff: Use ::staff for staff commands.", 8166); sendQuest("", 8167); sendQuest("Use ::pkstats to see your pk stats.", 8168); sendQuest("", 8169); sendQuest("Use ::pass (ur pass) if u want to change it.", 8170); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Just change those lines to say what u want them to.

Hope this helped

Read full topic
